items.title: The bitcoin bottom is falling out. Here's where the selling may stop, according to Katie Stockton
items.description: Bitcoin has steadied after falling below $90,000 on Tuesday, but the leading cryptocurrency could see more medium-term losses, Katie Stockton told CNB...

items.title: A tech portfolio hedge just in case Nvidia's earnings disappoint

items.title: Consumer stocks turn negative on year as inflation persists, economy stalls
items.description: The State Street SPDR S&P Retail ETF (XRT) has dropped more than 1% this year.
